about_the_game:
Prevent cable twisting effortlessly! Cable Guardian keeps track of your rotation in VR and lets you know when to turn the other way. Forget the cable and focus on the fun!

See the Pro DLC for position indicators and more. Unlimited free trial.

Features

  • Audio notifications with volume and pan adjustment
  • Support for custom sounds (*.wav)
  • Editable rules for triggering the sounds (rotation, orientation etc.)
  • Timer / alarm clock
  • Audio device selection
  • Auto-start with Windows or SteamVR
  • Extremely low CPU and GPU usage - no impact on gaming

Native Oculus support

Oculus headset users can use Cable Guardian without SteamVR. Just leave Cable Guardian running in the background and it works in every game regardless of the platform (Oculus Home or SteamVR). Note that this does not apply to the Pro-version visual features that require SteamVR.

Get more features with Cable Guardian Pro DLC ... (Try for free)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10 64bit (Perhaps also 32bit and Win 7, NOT TESTED)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Keyboard and mouse required
